briefdescription.para: Type alias for a centroid in Ndim dimensions.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the centroids
The data type for the centroid coordinates

briefdescription.para: Type alias for a collection of centroids in Ndim dimensions.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the Centroids
The data type for the centroid coordinates

memberdef.argsstring: (TQueue &queue, PointsHost< Ndim, THostInput > &h_points, const PointsDevice< Ndim, TDeviceInput, TDev > &d_points)
memberdef.name: copyToHost

briefdescription.para: Copies the results of the clustering from the device points to the host points.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the queue for the device operations
The number of dimensions of the points
The type of the input coordinates and weights for the host points
The type of the input coordinates and weights for the device points
The type of device that the points are allocated on
The queue used for the device operations
The points allocated on the host, where the clustering results will be saved
The points allocated on the device, where the clustering has been run

briefdescription.para: Copies the results of the clustering from the device points to the host points.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the queue for the device operations
The number of dimensions of the points
The type of the input coordinates and weights for the device points
The type of device that the points are allocated on
The queue used for the device operations
The points allocated on the host, where the clustering results will be saved
The points allocated on the device, where the clustering has been run

memberdef.argsstring: (TQueue &queue, PointsDevice< Ndim, TDeviceInput, TDev > &d_points, const PointsHost< Ndim, THostInput > &h_points)
memberdef.name: copyToDevice

briefdescription.para: Copies the coordinates and weights of the points from the host to the device.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the queue for the device operations
The number of dimensions of the points
The type of the input coordinates and weights for the device points
The type of device that the points are allocated on
The type of the input coordinates and weights for the host points
The queue used for the device operations
The empty points allocated on the device
The points allocated on the host, containing the points' coordinates and weights

briefdescription.para: Copies the coordinates and weights of the points from the host to the device.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the queue for the device operations
The number of dimensions of the points
The type of the input coordinates and weights for the host points
The type of device that the points are allocated on
The queue used for the device operations
The empty points allocated on the device
The points allocated on the host, containing the points' coordinates and weights

briefdescription.para: Read output points from a CSV file into a PointsHost object.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates and weights
The type of the queue to use for reading the file
The queue to use for reading the file
The path to the CSV file to read

simplesect.para: A PointsHost object containing the output points read from the file

briefdescription.para: Compute the centroid of a specific cluster from the given Points.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates
The PointsHost object containing the points
The ID of the cluster for which to compute the centroid

simplesect.para: The centroid of the specified cluster as an array of floating points

briefdescription.para: Compute the centroids of all clusters from the given Points.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates
The PointsHost object containing the points

simplesect.para: A vector of centroids, one for each cluster

briefdescription.para: Construct a map associating clusters to points This overload works on host points and returns a map allocated on the host.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates and weights
The points for which to get the clusters

simplesect.para: An AssociationMap where each key is a cluster index and the associated values are the indices of the points belonging to that cluster

briefdescription.para: Construct a map associating clusters to points This overload works on device points and returns a map allocated on the device.

parameterdescription.para: The type of queue to use for device computations
The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates and weights
The points for which to get the clusters

simplesect.para: An AssociationMap where each key is a cluster index and the associated values are the indices of the points belonging to that cluster

briefdescription.para: Get the alpaka device corresponding to a given index.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the device

simplesect.para: The alpaka device corresponding to the given index

briefdescription.para: Get an alpaka queue created from a device correspoding to a given index.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the device index, must be an integral type
The index of the device

simplesect.para: An alpaka queue created from the device corresponding to the given index

briefdescription.para: Get an alpaka queue created from a given device.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the device, must satisfy the concepts::device concept
The device to create the queue from

simplesect.para: An alpaka queue created from the given device

briefdescription.para: Read points from a CSV file into a PointsHost object.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates and weights
The type of the queue to use for reading the file
The queue to use for reading the file
The path to the CSV file to read

simplesect.para: A PointsHost object containing the points read from the file

briefdescription.para: Compute the silhouette score for a specific point in the dataset.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates and weights, which must be a floating-point type. By default, it is set to float.
The dataset containing the points
The index of the point for which to compute the silhouette score

simplesect.para: The silhouette score of the specified point
This function currently only works for points with non-periodic coordinates.

briefdescription.para: Compute the average silhouette score for the entire dataset.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points
The data type for the point coordinates and weights, which must be a floating-point type. By default, it is set to float.
The dataset containing the points

simplesect.para: The average silhouette score of the dataset
This function currently only works for points with non-periodic coordinates.
